Description: Crash ID – System-generated unique identifying number for a crash
Unit number entered on crash report for a unit involved in the crash
Person number captured on the crash report
Person Type
The physical location of an occupant in, on, or outside of the motor vehicle prior to the First Harmful Event or loss of control
Severity of injury to the occupant
Age of person involved in the crash
Ethnicity of person involved in the crash
Gender of person involved in the crash
The extent to which the person's body was expelled from the vehicle during any part of the crash
The type of restraint used by each occupant
Indicates whether a person's airbag deployed during the crash and in what manner
Indicates if a helmet was worn at the time of the crash
Crash ID – System-generated unique identifying number for a crash
Crash Date - Date on which crash occurred
Crash Time - Time crash occurred
Roadway System (road on which crash occurred)
Roadway Part (road on which crash occurred)
Toll Road/Toll Lane
Speed Limit

Construction Zone - Indicates whether the crash occurred in or was related to a construction, maintenance, or utility work zone, regardless of whether or not workers were actually present at the time of the crash
Workers Present - Indicates whether workers were present in the road construction zone at the time of the crash
At Intersection - Indicates if the crash occurred at an intersection.
Weather Condition - The prevailing atmospheric condition reported by the officer at the time of the crash
Light Condition - The type and level of light that existed at the time of the crash
Roadway Alignment - The geometric characteristics of the roadway at the crash site
Surface Condition - The surface condition (wet, dry, etc) present at the time and place of the crash
Traffic Control - Type of traffic control at the scene of the crash
Latitude map coordinate of the crash
Longitude map coordinate of the crash
Day of Week - The day of the week that the crash occurred
Crash ID – System-generated unique identifying number for a crash
Unit number entered on crash report for a unit involved in the crash
Unit Description  - Describes the type of unit
